original_text: Then the leaders sent some Pharisees to Jesus. They also sent some men who were friends of King Herod. They tried to use Jesus' words to cause trouble for him.
korean_text: 그들이 예수의 말씀을 책잡으려 하여 바리새인과 헤롯당 중에서 사람을 보내매

sentences.original_text: Then the leaders sent some Pharisees to Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 지도자들이 예수님께 바리새인 몇 사람을 보냈습니다.

sentences.original_text: who were friends of King Herod.
They tried to use Jesus' words
